pilotQuirks.description: The OpFor weapons have been depowered for this training exercise, effectively giving you a 10% damage reduction.

Description.Name: Training Exercise: Damage Reduction
Description.Details: All incoming damage reduced by 10%.

affinityLevels.decription: 15% boost to sprint speed!

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its sprinting speed by 15%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Sprint Boost

affinityLevels.decription: +2 bonus against being hit

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech makes it even harder to hit the mech.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Defensive Boost

affinityLevels.decription: 15% more jumping distance

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech makes it extremely mobile with its jump jets.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Jumping Boost

affinityLevels.decription: +5 morale whenever morale is gained

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its morale boost by 5.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Morale Boost

affinityLevels.decription: +1 bonus on weapon attacks

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its targeting by 1.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Targeting Boost

affinityLevels.decription: 15% boost to sensor and sight range

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech increases its vision and sensor range.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Sensor Boost

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech increases its vision and sensor range.
Description.Name: Osiris Affinity Sight Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Gains 1 bonus evasion on movement

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its evasive pips on movement by 1.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Evasive Pips Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Gains 2 extra pilot hits

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its life support systems by 2, reducing pilot hits even further.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Pilot Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Adds 6 bonus heat sinking, effectively two standard heat sinks.

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its heat sinking systems, increasing dissipation by 3.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Heat Dissipation Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Adds 9 bonus heat sinking, effectively three standard heat sinks.

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its heat sinking systems, increasing dissipation by 6.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Heat Dissipation Boost

affinityLevels.decription: 50% less chance to suffer critical hits

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its resistant to critical damage by 50%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Critical Hit Resistance Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Energy, Ballistic, and Missile weapons deal 10% more damage.

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its energy weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Energy Damage Boost

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its ballistic weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Ballistic Damage Boost

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its missile weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Missile Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Kicks, punches, and physical weapon attacks deal 15% more damage.

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its melee damage by 15%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Kick Damage Boost

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its melee damage by 15%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Punch Damage Boost

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its melee damage by 15%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Physical Weapon Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Gains +1 initiative

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech improves its initiative by 1.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Initiative Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Reduces stability damage taken by 50%.

Description.Details: The pilot's incredible skill with this mech reduces stability damage taken by 50%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Stab Damage Reduction

affinityLevels.decription: Wulf gains +15% sprint speed with his Commandos.

Description.Details: Wulf's incredible skill with this mech improves its sprinting speed by 15%.
Description.Name: Wulf Affinity Sprint Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Tex gains +10% energy damage with his Awesome.

Description.Details: Tex's incredible skill with this mech improves its energy damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Tex Affinity Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Loki gains +30% physical weapon damage with his Hatchetman's hatchet.

Description.Details: Loki's incredible skill with this mech improves its hatchet damage by 30%.
Description.Name: Loki Affinity Physical Weapon Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: t-bone gains +10% ballistic damage with his Corsair.

Description.Details: t-bone's incredible skill with this mech improves its ballistic damage by 10%.
Description.Name: t-bone Affinity Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Bloodydoves gains +10% weapon damage with his King Crab.

Description.Details: BD's incredible skill with this mech improves its energy weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Energy Damage Boost

Description.Name: Mech Affinity Ballistic Damage Boost

Description.Details: BD's incredible skill with this mech improves its missile weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Missile Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Shade gains +10% damage reduction in his Valkyrie II.

Description.Details: Shade's incredible skill with this mech improves its damage reduction by 10%.
Description.Name: Shade Affinity Damage Reduction Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Turtrus gains a unique +2 hit defense in his Crab due to his electronics expertise. Stacks with ECM.

Description.Details: Turtrus' incredible skill with this mech grants him +2 hit defense at all times.
Description.Name: Turtrus Affinity Hit Defense Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Hellion gains 20% damage reduction in her Bushwacker at all times.

Description.Details: Hellion gains 20% damage reduction in her Bushwacker at all times.
Description.Name: Hellion Affinity Damage Reduction Boost

affinityLevels.decription: Raza gains +10% energy damage and ignores 1 evasion with energy weapons in his Mongoose.

Description.Details: Raza's incredible skill with this mech improves its energy weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Energy Damage Boost

Description.Details: Raza's incredible skill with this mech improves its energy weapon damage by 10%.
Description.Name: Mech Affinity Energy Damage Boost

affinityLevels.decription: LeFay's sensor signature is reduced by 40% in her Merlin, making her less likely to take enemy fire.

Description.Details: LeFay gains 40% sensor reduction in her Merlin at all times.
Description.Name: LeFay Affinity Sensor Signature Reduction

affinityLevels.decription: Ridgeline's dream came true, he's driving a LAM! He gets +2 bonus accurascy in Wasp LAMs, Stinger LAMs, and Phoenix Hawk LAMs.

Description.Details: Ridgeline gains +2 bonus accurascy in Wasp LAMs, Stinger LAMs, and Phoenix Hawk LAMs.
Description.Name: Ridgeline Affinity LAM Accuracy

affinityLevels.levelName: Bring Your Pretty Face To My Axe
affinityLevels.decription: Pharoah's skill with his Berserker grants him a little extra speed in it, increasing his sprint speed somewhat.

Description.Details: Pharoah gains +0.2 sprint modifier in his Berserker.
Description.Name: Pharoah Affinity Berserker Speed

affinityLevels.decription: Revostae's skill with his Archer grants him a small damage bonus with missile weapons.

Description.Details: Revostae gains a 10% missile damage increase in his Archer.
Description.Name: Revosate Affinity Archer Missile Damage

affinityLevels.decription: Scorch's skill with his Cataphract grants him increased critical damage resistance, making crits 35% less likely against him.

Description.Details: Scorch takes 35% less crits against him when he's in his Cataphract.
Description.Name: Scorch Affinity Cataphract Crit Resist
